title: Daily Reminder to those who claim Assassins dont exist and take way too long in their burst windows

yea i think zed is actually too strong atm. He was able to kill me in my last ranked game. Why was he able to kill me. Thats not fair. Why should zed be able to kill me. theres no counterplay

{{champion:40}}
omg i have to try this.
Ive been killed by {{champion:29}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3153}} faster than {{champion:99}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}}
If Lux actually hit her Q , that is a lie.
I HIT A Q , USE R , WHILE ANIMATION TWICH GIVE ME 2 AA , 2 CRIT OF 600 + ON HIT EFECTS + sTATIK = INSTA DEAD GG
Yea , I'm sure a Twitch that is the same level/items as you crits you for 600 at 3 items lmao.

If Twitch was level 14 at the time, with just those items, he'd have over 200 AD (even without runes and masteries.  With full runes, plus, say, fervor, he can hit up to 275 AD at that point) which with IE is already almost a 600 damage crit, as its 500 at 200 AD, and over 688 with the full set up,  add in the on hit from BotRK, his extra damage on his ultimate, the shiv hit plus crit which is 345 damage already, and he could potentially be clocking in at over 1k base damage before mitigation from a single crit with just those three items, and runes.
dont forget about {{item:3504}}

Ever see a full lethality {{champion:51}}?


Walk in range. 

Auto once

Ult 

**An enemy has been slain**

Really?
People made Riot gutting her and even now, when she sits on 45% winrate, still complaining about Caitlyn?

The bias in these boards are just amazing.

It was a joking post. I have a roomate who loves to theory craft silly builds and  lethality caitlyn was one of his creations. If he can ever walk in range of a squishy while they're alone he literally two shots them with an auto and ult. 

The first time I saw it I had to blink twice to process what had just happened. The enemy jinx had been on 70% hp before the ult hit. Then she was on 0% hp.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tuJtAilI,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-09-09T11:18:16.483+0000)
>
> Really?
> People made Riot gutting her and even now, when she sits on 45% winrate, still complaining about Caitlyn?
> 
> The bias in these boards are just amazing.

That comment was not meant to be taken seriously, Stop being butt hurt.
hE IS JOKING , BVUT there are videos on youtube about caitlyn r letality killing an adc full hp
Hillarious and original. Also Vayne wouldn't burst anyone if those PBE changes went through.
Good, tumble crits with shie/i.e are ridiculous

You know, it's funny. Everyone complained there was no counterplay to assassin's like Zed and Rengar because they burst so fast.

Now everyone's like Assassins are useless.

There barely was counterplay to Rengar pre assassin update, the complaining about Zed was bullshit though.

He's literally the only assassin I'd call a success.

Rengar a success?

Don't make me laugh.
He means Zed.
Is it bad that I actually predicted this from a quick look at the upvotes?
In the next season just right click ONCE, automatically kills the enemy. I wonder how much they'll boost this dmg creep meta
We get it. The joke is beaten, dead, butchered, chopped up, shot, run through, blown up, and mulched. I don't care how true or untrue it is, the joke is dead, come up with something original.
Original, on the boards? You expect way too much of this place.
daily reminder when someone is fed they become stronger wooooow
But do any of yall know about lethality ezreal
Knew what it was going to be when I clicked it. Take an upvote anyway.

I once got bursted by a {{champion:79}}  with {{item:3025}} {{item:3047}} {{item:1401}} {{item:3193}} faster than I did by a {{champion:7}} with {{item:3146}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3135}}
I call bullshit. Show the replay.

I'd buy Gragas being able to 1v1 you with that build, especially since you didn't have Lord Dominik's, and that's not LB's ideal rush, anyways.

But burst? Hell no. He'd be able to kill you 1v1, because of your lack of decent lifesteal, but the only serious burst he has with that build is if he ults you into his obelisk.

He ulted me, body slammed me, Q, empowered auto, Q pop and I was dead because of a TLD proc xD

I was out of position and deserved to be punished, yes, but i find it funny that he burst me down faster than an Assassin could
